title: 谁来帮我设置服务器的权限组啊！qiu
author: Bzrry
txt_content:
等于是我的服务器有三个特殊权限组，分别是白银VIP
黄金VIP
钻石VIP
他们权限全部继承了Builder的权限
但为什么还是不能啊
plugin\groupmanage\worlds\world\group.yml如下
============================================
# Group inheritance
#
# Any inherited groups prefixed with a g: are global groups
# and are inherited from the GlobalGroups.yml.
#
# Groups without the g: prefix are groups local to this world
# and are defined in the this groups.yml file.
#
# Local group inheritances define your promotion tree when using 'manpromote/mandemote'

groups:
  Default:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - -bukkit.command.kill
    inheritance:
    - g:groupmanager_default
    - g:bukkit_default
    - g:essentials_default
    - g:towny_default
    info:
      prefix: '&e'
      build: false
      suffix: ''
  Owner:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - -vanish.*
    - '*'
    inheritance:
    - admin
    info:
      prefix: '&4[腐竹]'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  黄金VIP:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - coreprotect.inspect
    - coreprotect.lookup
    inheritance:
    - default
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
    info:
      prefix: ''
      build: false
      suffix: ''
  特约VIP:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - coreprotect.inspect
    - coreprotect.lookup
    inheritance:
    - default
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
    info:
      prefix: '[&3特约VIP]'
      build: false
      suffix: ''
  钻石VIP:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - coreprotect.inspect
    - coreprotect.lookup
    inheritance:
    - default
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
    info:
      prefix: '&b钻石VIP---'
      build: false
      suffix: ''
  Builder:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - coreprotect.inspect
    - coreprotect.lookup
    inheritance:
    - default
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
    info:
      prefix: '&f[&6生存者&f]'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Moderator:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - builder
    - g:groupmanager_moderator
    - g:bukkit_moderator
    - g:essentials_moderator
    - g:towny_moderator
    - g:vanish_moderator
    info:
      prefix: '&5[城管]'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  白银VIP:
    default: true
    permissions:
    - coreprotect.inspect
    - coreprotect.lookup
    inheritance:
    - default
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
    info:
      prefix: '&8白银VIP---'
      build: false
      suffix: ''
  Admin:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - moderator
    - g:groupmanager_admin
    - g:bukkit_admin
    - g:essentials_admin
    - g:towny_admin
    - g:vanish_admin
    info:
      prefix: '&4[造物者]'
      build: true
      suffix: ''

=============================
这样VIP还是一点权限都没有

replies.author: wwpzxp
replies.txt_content:
/mangaddv 黄金VIP build true
/mangaddv 钻石VIP build true
/mangaddv 白银VIP build true

replies.author: Bzrry
replies.txt_content:
MC小罗 发表于 2014-2-5 13:19
沙发，沙发沙发耶耶
求教，你有关于权限组的教程贴么

replies.author: wwpzxp
replies.txt_content: 请在游戏里在输入一遍/mangaddv 权限组1 权限组2 true

replies.author: Bzrry
replies.txt_content:
wwpzxp 发表于 2014-2-5 13:35
/mangaddv 黄金VIP build true
/mangaddv 钻石VIP build true
/mangaddv 白银VIP build true
问一下怎么设置等级顺序呢
比如生存者-----白银-----特约----黄金----钻石
OP用manpromote命令进行管理

replies.author: wwpzxp
replies.txt_content:
Bzrry 发表于 2014-2-5 14:03
问一下怎么设置等级顺序呢
比如生存者-----白银-----特约----黄金----钻石
OP用manpromote命令进行管理 ...
=_=|| 此插件没有顺序功能。给用户加到组里，然后用/who就能看见每一个组里在线的人了

replies.author: Bzrry
replies.txt_content:
wwpzxp 发表于 2014-2-5 14:05
=_=|| 此插件没有顺序功能。给用户加到组里，然后用/who就能看见每一个组里在线的人了 ...
